title: Riot please promise me this guy will be banned
body:
I had a Draven basically rage quit, run to mid, and give up because...wait for it...


I didn't go for a kill as lv 3 Soraka and didn't ward the river while my trinket was on CD. Basically just spamming the chat telling the enemy to kill me, saying I'm retarded, telling me to never play again, etc. I have faith in you guys but please let us know when anyone we reported in a 1 week time span gets banned. It's so satisfying to see that message. 

http://i.imgur.com/0YhsKwP.png

He even kept going in post-game chat (not sure if automated system looks at that).
